targets.query:
from(bucket: "Laboratorio")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Módulo solar-eólico")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "EG001" or r["_field"] == "EG002" or r["_field"] == "EI001" or r["_field"] == "ER001" or r["_field"] == "FP001" or r["_field"] == "FP002" or r["_field"] == "IAC001" or r["_field"] == "IAC002" or r["_field"] == "IG001" or r["_field"] == "IG005" or r["_field"] == "PB001" or r["_field"] == "PB002" or r["_field"] == "PDC001" or r["_field"] == "PG001" or r["_field"] == "PG002" or r["_field"] == "PG003" or r["_field"] == "PG004" or r["_field"] == "PKVA002" or r["_field"] == "PKVA001" or r["_field"] == "PKVAR001" or r["_field"] == "PKVAR002" or r["_field"] == "PKW001" or r["_field"] == "PKW002" or r["_field"] == "RPM001" or r["_field"] == "RS001" or r["_field"] == "RS002" or r["_field"] == "TB001" or r["_field"] == "TB002" or r["_field"] == "TE001" or r["_field"] == "TE002" or r["_field"] == "TE003" or r["_field"] == "TE004" or r["_field"] == "VAC001" or r["_field"] == "VAC002" or r["_field"] == "VB001" or r["_field"] == "VB002" or r["_field"] == "VBU001" or r["_field"] == "VBU002" or r["_field"] == "VCH001" or r["_field"] == "VCH002" or r["_field"] == "VDC001" or r["_field"] == "VFL001" or r["_field"] == "VFL002" or r["_field"] == "VG001" or r["_field"] == "VG002" or r["_field"] == "VG003" or r["_field"] == "VG004" or r["_field"] == "VGR001" or r["_field"] == "VV001")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Módulo solar-eólico")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PG002")
